mangaName: The Sorcerer King of Destruction and the Golem of the Barbarian Queen
alternativeNames: Hametsu no Madou Ou to Golem no Ban Kisaki
Hametsu no Madouou to Golem no Banhi
Король-волшебник разрушений и голем Королева варваров
破滅の魔導王とゴーレムの蛮妃
author: Northcarolina
description: A young man suddenly awakens in the middle of an open field, with only his lame pajamas as company. Apparently he was summoned as a "Sorcerer King of Destruction" to destroy the world. What the Hell?! But nothing's going to happen by staying depressed, so why not make a golem with earth magic! And then…? Exploring another world with the strongest inhuman partner!
